tips.title: Introduce Yourself to the Community
tips.description: Create a short introductory video where the candidate shares their background, values, and connection to the community.

details.content_focus: Personal introduction, key issues, motivation for running
suggestions: Include personal stories that relate to local issues

tips.title: Talk About Local Issues
tips.description: Post videos explaining key issues affecting the community and what the candidate plans to do about them.

details.content_focus: Specific local issues like infrastructure, schools, jobs, etc.
suggestions: Use simple language, avoid political jargon
Incorporate visuals like charts or on-site visits to affected areas

tips.title: Engage with a Q&A Session
tips.description: Host a YouTube Live or pre-recorded Q&A video where the candidate answers questions from the community.

details.content_focus: Answering voter questions on key issues, addressing community concerns
suggestions: Ask for questions from the community on social media beforehand
Respond to both supportive and challenging questions

tips.title: Show Behind-the-Scenes of Campaign Life
tips.description: Create a video series showing the day-to-day activities of the campaign to humanize the candidate.

details.content_focus: Behind-the-scenes of meetings, community events, or preparations
suggestions: Show the team and volunteers working behind the campaign

tips.title: Highlight Community Stories and Testimonials
tips.description: Feature local community members sharing their stories or testimonials about the candidate’s impact or vision.

details.content_focus: Personal stories, testimonials from community members or local leaders
suggestions: Film in the community, showing local faces
Highlight diverse voices and issues that matter to them

tips.title: Address Election FAQs
tips.description: Create a video that answers frequently asked questions about the election process or the candidate’s positions.

details.content_focus: Election process, voting, candidate’s key positions
suggestions: Answer questions like how and where to vote
Clarify the candidate’s position on confusing or controversial issues

tips.title: Share Vision for the Future
tips.description: Post a video outlining the candidate’s vision for the future of the community and how they plan to achieve it.

details.content_focus: Future goals, policies, and vision for the town
suggestions: Incorporate visuals of what the town could look like with the proposed changes
Use a positive and hopeful tone
